.. _past training:

Past Training Events
=========================

You can find the training examples for the past events on `Github`_:

.. _Github: https://github.com/nci/Data-Training

Note: the data used in some ipython notebook examples are no longer exist.


.. tabularcolumns:: |p{1cm}|p{1cm}

.. csv-table:: Training slides for downloading
   :file: ../_static/past_training.csv
   :header-rows: 1
   :class: longtable
   :widths: 20 40
